Parallax Template

A modern responsive front-end framework based on Material Design

Get Started


flash_on

What is this?

It's a website template.

Specifically, it's a starter template to help create a modern, full featured website, but in a way that is simultaneously fast, cheap, and easy.

group

What is it good for?

Absolutely some things. Not every site makes sense as a static site. Some sites have requirements that can only be met by dynamic content management systems.

settings

Why would anyone do that?

As long as it meets requirements, a static site will be cheaper to build, cheaper to run, and cheaper to maintain. All of this without sacrificing performance.

Why drive your site with yesterday's tech? Assemble and Netlify are the absolute best technologies for high performance sites.

More Info

Using Grunt and Assemble.io, the Materialize framework may be used to build beautiful interfaces that are simple to maintain and so simple they may be hosted practically anywhere, for cheap or even free in a lot of cases.

This template's aim is to make these two technologies easy to use together.

This page is hosted for free thanks to GitHub Pages.

In fact, static sites can use cutting edge technology like Netlify as a host. Services like Netlify host static sites on their custom built CDN in multiple locations around the planet.

A modern responsive front-end framework based on Material Design

you have just been viewing a website.

Feel free to use this site for testing purposes to see the kind of responsiveness you can expect from your own static site.
